content.prompt: Which of the following conclusions can be drawn based on the table?

choices.label: Forty-six Republicans voted against the bill, which led to a successful filibuster.
The bill was able to pass because some Republicans and Independents voted for it along with all Democrats.
Independents align most strongly with Republicans in the Senate.
The smaller chamber size of the Senate made this bill easier to pass in the Senate than in the House of Representatives.

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
